alert.note: Alert for Adams; Arapahoe (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 3:50PM MDT until August 15 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Arapahoe County in northeastern Colorado... Central Adams County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 430 PM MDT. * At 350 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles east of Arapahoe Park, or 21 miles east of Denver, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Watkins around 400 PM MDT. Manila Village around 405 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Bennett. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
